constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCALISE:
H.R. 837.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The First Amendment guarantees both free speech and the
free exercise of religion. The Free Speech Fairness Act
restores these fundamental liberties to churches and
nonprofits.
[Page H388]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: Free Speech Fairness Act
